Articles.Content:
Does anyone here use Algodoo? It's a free 2D physics simulator, and its very fun to try engineering things. It has a whole bunch of features, including a simulation of gravity.

Here's a picture of a spacecraft hangar I made in Algodoo:

It's highly functional, with the hangar doors opening and closing and that cargo elevator on the right being controllable. It's also breakable. A true testament to what Algodoo is capable of.
